mapper.sql: print_template_id AS "printTemplateId", type AS "type", name AS "name", templete AS "templete", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId",tenant_id AS "tenantId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_print_template where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and print_template_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.printTemplateId},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
and templete like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.templete},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
